comment.author: 80506458@N00
comment._content: Interesting point of fact, the names of the streets where I live are all named after astronauts....Lovell, Schirra, Glenn, Wolfe, so on and so forth.  Houses broke ground in 1970, we were able to inhabit in 1972.  A lasting tribute, I'd say.

comment.author: 80506458@N00
comment._content: Correcting myself.  We were first occupants on street, and that was 9/8/73.
